body_html: @reedwm Does it mean that TensorFlow does not plan to implement native FP16 (half-precision) FMA Cuda ops (opcode HFMA2) -- https://devblogs.nvidia.com/parallelforall/mixed-precision-programming-cuda-8/ ? For inference there could be some applications which could have a significant speedup (theoretically 2x increase in FLOPS) and it is acceptable for these applications to have reduced precision?
